item.description:
FRI OCT 12 -OF MICE AND MEN By John Steinbeck
with The Connecticut Theatre Group
Includes Pre Party and Afterparty

* PLUS: FREE Wine and Cheese Party at Playhouse on Park *

Adapted from John Steinbeck's famous novel, Of Mice and Men follows the lives of George and Lennie, two drifters that dream of owning their own land.

When their journey brings them to a ranch where they hope to earn enough money to finally buy their own property, trouble stirs and their plans must change. In this moment, George is forced to make a decision that challenges the core of human nature and morality.

In this critically acclaimed drama, Steinbeck brings the trials of the Great Depression to the forefront, while providing an honest and heart wrenching depiction of these tragic characters.

As a unique opportunity to see this iconic tale onstage, educational programs are encouraged to attend.

"Timely and devastatingly effective." - The New York Times

"Even if you already know how Of Mice and Men ends, you may be surprised how much more powerful it is onstage." - Colorado Springs Independent

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Pre-Party starts at 6:30pm - Show starts at 8pm

FREE SAFE PARKING
Get an Online Advance Ticket Discount
Advance Tickets are $25
* Tickets are $32.50 at the event

PLUS: FREE Wine and Cheese Party at Playhouse on Park

Playhouse on Park
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119

EXIT 43 PARK ROAD off 84
Next to AC Petersons

Pick up your ticket before the show at the Pre-Party with the Connecticut Theatre Group, or at the ticket window

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP SECTION-THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Visit http://www.CTTheatre.org or call (860) 987-7888
